instruction.value: Administer dose over 15 to 30 minutes. (800 mg = 20 vials)
Administer dose over 15 to 30 minutes. (400 mg = 10 vials)

AdditionalNotes.value: Acute ingestion of unknown amount, if life threatening toxicity is present.
Acute ingestion of unknown amount, observe patient response and follow with an additional 400 mg (10 vials) if indicated.
Acute Ingestion of KNOWN Amount: Digoxin tablets or elixir overdose.
Acute Ingestion of KNOWN Amount: IV Digoxin overdose.
Acute Ingestion of KNOWN Amount: Based on steady-state serum digoxin concentration..
